deleteComic.title: Do you really want to delete?

Synced {{synced}} of {{total}} items successfully.

Some items failed to sync.

Reader.switchToRtl: Switch to Right to Left Reading

about.repositoryDescription: Visit the project repository on GitHub

debug.enableLoggingDescription: Enable detailed logging for debugging purposes

language.description: Choose your preferred language for the application interface
language.label: Select Language

theme.description: Choose your preferred theme for the application interface
theme.label: Theme

webUI.autoPortDescription: Automatically find an available port starting from 8080
webUI.autoSyncDescription: Automatically sync changes to the cloud after editing comics, chapters, or read progress. Operations are batched together when performed in sequence.
webUI.enableWebUIDescription: Enable web-based user interface for remote access
webUI.portDescription: Port number for the Web UI server
webUI.urlDescription: Access the Web UI through this URL

install.description: Download and install plugins from the repository
install.label: Install Plugin
install.notAvailableInWebUI: Plugin installation is not available in Web UI mode. Plugins must be installed directly on the server running the application.

autoUpdate.description: Automatically download and install updates when available
autoUpdate.notAvailableMacOS: Auto-update is not available on macOS. Updates must be downloaded manually.
autoUpdate.notAvailableOther: Auto-update is not available on this platform. Updates must be downloaded manually.
autoUpdate.notAvailableWindows: Auto-update is not available on Windows. Updates must be downloaded manually.

nonStable.description: Allow the app to check for and install beta and alpha releases
nonStable.notAvailableWhenAutoUpdateDisabled: Non-stable updates are only available when auto-update is enabled.

user.chaptersReadDescription: Total number of chapters with reading progress
user.currentUserDescription: The currently selected user for reading progress
user.defaultReadingModeDescription: Choose the default reading mode for comics (can be overridden per comic)
user.exportDataDescription: Export your reading data and settings
user.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language (overrides app language)
user.autoSyncDescription: Automatically sync your data to the website after making changes (batches operations for 2 seconds)
user.autoSyncDisabledDescription: Connect to the website to enable automatic sync
user.pagesReadDescription: Total number of pages read across all chapters
user.readingDirectionDescription: Choose the reading direction for comics
user.themeDescription: Choose your preferred theme (overrides app theme)
user.title: User Settings

wallpaper.description: Choose a custom wallpaper for the app
wallpaper.label: Wallpaper
wallpaper.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this wallpaper?

websiteAuth.connectError: Failed to connect to website account
websiteAuth.description: Connect your app account to your Comic Universe website account at comicuniverse.app
websiteAuth.disconnectError: Failed to disconnect from website account
websiteAuth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
websiteAuth.reAuthMessage: Your website authentication has expired or is invalid. Please re-authenticate to continue using website features.
websiteAuth.syncRequiredMessage: You need to connect your app to your Comic Universe website account to sync your comics and reading progress.
websiteAuth.title: Website Account

deleteUser.deleteUserMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this user? All reading progress will be lost permanently.
